lines.text:
[to a priest, as she's dying]
Pretty soon I'll be seeing your boss!

[about his daughter]
She has a new car, hasn't she? Another woman driver to make life unsafe on the streets!

[on Connie's relationship with Neil]
They're good friends, that's all. I'd trust Neil Dillon anytime.
You would, eh? I wouldn't trust any lawyer - or banker, either!
